mapper.insert: insert into product (PRODID, PRODNAME, PRODCOUNT, PROVID, BUYCOUNT) values (#{prodid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prodname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodcount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{provid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buycount,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select PRODID, PRODNAME, PRODCOUNT, PROVID, BUYCOUNT from product
